card.name: Chishiro, the Shattered Blade
card.property: Whenever an Aura or Equipment you control enters, create a 2/2 red Spirit creature token with menace. At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on each modified creature you control. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

card.name: Kotori, Pilot Prodigy
card.property: Vehicles you control have crew 2. At the beginning of combat on your turn, target artifact creature you control gains lifelink and vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Kaima, the Fractured Calm
card.property: At the beginning of your end step, goad each creature your opponents control that's enchanted by an Aura you control. Put a +1/+1 counter on Kaima, the Fractured Calm for each creature goaded this way. (Until your next turn, the goaded creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)

card.name: Shorikai, Genesis Engine
card.property: {1}, {T}: Draw two cards, then discard a card. Create a 1/1 colorless Pilot creature token with "This creature crews Vehicles as though its power were 2 greater." Crew 8 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 8 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.) Shorikai, Genesis Engine can be your commander.

card.name: Aerial Surveyor
card.property: Flying Whenever Aerial Surveyor attacks, if defending player controls more lands than you, search your library for a basic Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Crew 2

card.name: Drumbellower
card.property: Flying Untap all creatures you control during each other player's untap step.

card.name: Ironsoul Enforcer
card.property: Whenever Ironsoul Enforcer or a commander you control attacks alone, return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Organic Extinction
card.property: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Destroy all nonartifact creatures.

card.name: Release to Memory
card.property: Exile target opponent's graveyard. For each creature card exiled this way, create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token.

card.name: Swift Reconfiguration
card.property: Flash Enchant creature or Vehicle Enchanted permanent is a Vehicle artifact with crew 5 and it loses all other card types. (It's not a creature unless it's crewed.)

card.name: Access Denied
card.property: Counter target spell. Create X 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying, where X is that spell's mana value.

card.name: Cyberdrive Awakener
card.property: Flying Other artifact creatures you control have flying. When Cyberdrive Awakener enters, until end of turn, each noncreature artifact you control becomes an artifact creature with base power and toughness 4/4.

card.name: Imposter Mech
card.property: You may have Imposter Mech enter as a copy of a creature an opponent controls, except it's a Vehicle artifact with crew 3 and it loses all other card types. Crew 3

card.name: Kappa Cannoneer
Katsumasa, the Animator
card.property: Flying {2}{U}: Until end of turn, target noncreature artifact you control becomes an artifact creature and gains flying. If it's not a Vehicle, it has base power and toughness 1/1 until end of turn. At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to three target noncreature artifacts.

card.name: Research Thief
card.property: Flash Flying Whenever an artifact creature you control deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

card.name: Universal Surveillance
card.property: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Draw X cards.

card.name: Akki Battle Squad
card.property: Whenever one or more modified creatures you control attack, untap all modified creatures you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase. This ability triggers only once each turn. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

card.name: Collision of Realms
card.property: Each player shuffles all creatures they own into their library. Each player who shuffled a nontoken creature into their library this way reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a creature card, then puts that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of their library in a random order.

card.name: Kami of Celebration
card.property: Whenever a modified creature you control attacks, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.) Whenever you cast a spell from exile, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

card.name: Komainu Battle Armor
card.property: Menace Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has menace. Whenever Komainu Battle Armor or equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, goad each creature that player controls. Reconfigure {4} ({4}: Attach to target creature you control; or unattach from a creature. Reconfigure only as a sorcery. While attached, this isn't a creature.)

card.name: Smoke Spirits' Aid
card.property: For each of up to X target creatures, create a red Aura enchantment token named Smoke Blessing attached to that creature. Those tokens have enchant creature and "When enchanted creature dies, it deals 1 damage to its controller and you create a Treasure token."

card.name: Unquenchable Fury
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "Whenever this creature attacks, it deals X damage to defending player, where X is the number of cards in their hand." When Unquenchable Fury is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return it to your hand.

card.name: Ascendant Acolyte
card.property: Ascendant Acolyte enters with a +1/+1 counter on it for each +1/+1 counter among other creatures you control. At the beginning of your upkeep, double the number of +1/+1 counters on Ascendant Acolyte.

card.name: Concord with the Kami
card.property: At the beginning of your end step, choose one or more — • Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature with a counter on it. • Draw a card if you control an enchanted creature. • Create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token if you control an equipped creature.

card.name: Kosei, Penitent Warlord
card.property: As long as Kosei, Penitent Warlord is enchanted, equipped, and has a counter on it, Kosei has "Whenever Kosei, Penitent Warlord deals combat damage to an opponent, you draw that many cards and Kosei deals that much damage to each other opponent."

card.name: One with the Kami
card.property: Flash Enchant creature you control Whenever enchanted creature or another modified creature you control dies, create X 1/1 colorless Spirit creature tokens, where X is that creature's power. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

card.name: Rampant Rejuvenator
card.property: Rampant Rejuvenator enters with two +1/+1 counters on it. When Rampant Rejuvenator dies, search your library for up to X basic land cards, where X is Rampant Rejuvenator's power, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Silkguard
card.property: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to X target creatures you control. Auras, Equipment, and modified creatures you control gain hexproof until end of turn. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

card.name: Tanuki Transplanter
card.property: Whenever Tanuki Transplanter or equipped creature attacks, add an amount of {G} equal to its power. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end. Reconfigure {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control; or unattach from a creature. Reconfigure only as a sorcery. While attached, this isn't a creature.)

card.name: Myojin of Blooming Dawn
card.property: Myojin of Blooming Dawn enters with an indestructible counter on it if you cast it from your hand. Remove an indestructible counter from Myojin of Blooming Dawn: Create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token for each permanent you control.

card.name: Yoshimaru, Ever Faithful
card.property: Whenever another legendary permanent you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on Yoshimaru, Ever Faithful. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

card.name: Myojin of Cryptic Dreams
card.property: Myojin of Cryptic Dreams enters with an indestructible counter on it if you cast it from your hand. Remove an indestructible counter from Myojin of Cryptic Dreams: Copy target permanent spell you control three times. (The copies become tokens.)

card.name: Myojin of Grim Betrayal
card.property: Myojin of Grim Betrayal enters with an indestructible counter on it if you cast it from your hand. Remove an indestructible counter from Myojin of Grim Betrayal: Put onto the battlefield under your control all creature cards in all graveyards that were put there from anywhere this turn.

card.name: Ruthless Technomancer
card.property: When Ruthless Technomancer enters, you may sacrifice another creature you control. If you do, create a number of Treasure tokens equal to that creature's power. {2}{B}, Sacrifice X artifacts: Return target creature card with power X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. X can't be 0.

card.name: Myojin of Roaring Blades
card.property: Myojin of Roaring Blades enters with an indestructible counter on it if you cast it from your hand. Remove an indestructible counter from Myojin of Roaring Blades: It deals 7 damage to each of up to three targets.

card.name: Go-Shintai of Life's Origin
Myojin of Towering Might
card.property: Myojin of Towering Might enters with an indestructible counter on it if you cast it from your hand. Remove an indestructible counter from Myojin of Towering Might: Distribute eight +1/+1 counters among any number of target creatures you control. They gain trample until end of turn.

card.property: Flying Whenever Aerial Surveyor attacks, if defending player controls more lands than you, search your library for a basic Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Crew 2

card.name: Kotori, Pilot Prodigy
card.property: Vehicles you control have crew 2. At the beginning of combat on your turn, target artifact creature you control gains lifelink and vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Aeronaut Admiral
card.property: Flying Vehicles you control have flying.

card.name: Armed and Armored
card.property: Vehicles you control become artifact creatures until end of turn. Choose a Dwarf you control. Attach any number of Equipment you control to it.

card.name: Cataclysmic Gearhulk
card.property: Vigilance When Cataclysmic Gearhulk enters, each player chooses an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, and a planeswalker from among the nonland permanents they control, then sacrifices the rest.

card.name: Crush Contraband
card.property: Choose one or both — • Exile target artifact. • Exile target enchantment.

card.name: Dispatch
card.property: Tap target creature. Metalcraft — If you control three or more artifacts, exile that creature.

card.name: Generous Gift
card.property: Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.

card.name: Indomitable Archangel
card.property: Flying Metalcraft — Artifacts you control have shroud as long as you control three or more artifacts. (An artifact with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

card.name: Myrsmith
card.property: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token.

card.name: Parhelion II
card.property: Flying, first strike, vigilance Whenever Parhelion II attacks, create two 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying and vigilance that are attacking. Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Sram, Senior Edificer
card.property: Whenever you cast an Aura, Equipment, or Vehicle spell, draw a card.

card.name: Swords to Plowshares
card.property: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

card.name: Teshar, Ancestor's Apostle
card.property: Flying Whenever you cast a historic spell, return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

card.name: Emry, Lurker of the Loch
card.property: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control. When Emry, Lurker of the Loch enters, mill four cards. {T}: Choose target artifact card in your graveyard. You may cast that card this turn. (You still pay its costs. Timing rules still apply.)

card.name: Etherium Sculptor
card.property: Artifact spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Jace, Architect of Thought
card.property: +1: Until your next turn, whenever a creature an opponent controls attacks, it gets -1/-0 until end of turn. −2: Reveal the top three cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library in any order. −8: For each player, search that player's library for a nonland card and exile it, then that player shuffles. You may cast those cards without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Master of Etherium
card.property: Master of Etherium's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifacts you control. Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Reality Shift
card.property: Exile target creature. Its controller manifests the top card of their library. (That player puts the top card of their library onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. If it's a creature card, it can be turned face up any time for its mana cost.)

card.name: Riddlesmith
card.property: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

card.name: Sai, Master Thopterist
card.property: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. {1}{U}, Sacrifice two artifacts: Draw a card.

card.name: Thopter Spy Network
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control an artifact, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. Whenever one or more artifact creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, draw a card.

card.name: Thoughtcast
card.property: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) Draw two cards.

card.name: Vedalken Engineer
card.property: {T}: Add two mana of any one color. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.

card.name: Whirler Rogue
card.property: When Whirler Rogue enters, create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying. Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Agitator Ant
card.property: At the beginning of your end step, each player may put two +1/+1 counters on a creature they control. Goad each creature that had counters put on it this way. (Until your next turn, those creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)

card.name: Chain Reaction
card.property: Chain Reaction deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of creatures on the battlefield.

card.name: Chaos Warp
card.property: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.

card.name: Elemental Mastery
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: Create X 1/1 red Elemental creature tokens with haste, where X is this creature's power. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step."

card.name: Goblin Razerunners
Krenko, Tin Street Kingpin
card.property: Whenever Krenko, Tin Street Kingpin attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it, then create a number of 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens equal to Krenko's power.

card.name: Ox of Agonas
card.property: When Ox of Agonas enters, discard your hand, then draw three cards. Escape—{R}{R}, Exile eight other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.) Ox of Agonas escapes with a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Shifting Shadow
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has haste and "At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy this creature. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield and attach Shifting Shadow to it, then put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in a random order."

card.name: Starstorm
card.property: Starstorm deals X damage to each creature. Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Taurean Mauler
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Taurean Mauler.

card.name: Acidic Slime
card.property: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) When Acidic Slime enters, destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

card.name: Bear Umbra
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "Whenever this creature attacks, untap all lands you control." Umbra armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

card.name: Beast Within
card.property: Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

card.name: Champion of Lambholt
card.property: Creatures with power less than Champion of Lambholt's power can't block creatures you control. Whenever another creature you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on Champion of Lambholt.

card.name: Fertilid
card.property: Fertilid enters with two +1/+1 counters on it. {1}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Fertilid: Target player searches their library for a basic land card, puts it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffles.

card.name: Forgotten Ancient
card.property: Whenever a player casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Forgotten Ancient. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move any number of +1/+1 counters from Forgotten Ancient onto other creatures.

card.name: Genesis Hydra
card.property: When you cast this spell, reveal the top X cards of your library. You may put a nonland permanent card with mana value X or less from among them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle the rest into your library. Genesis Hydra enters with X +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Hunter's Insight
card.property: Choose target creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker this turn, draw that many cards.

card.name: Kodama's Reach
card.property: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Loyal Guardian
card.property: Trample Lieutenant — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control your commander, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Ordeal of Nylea
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Nylea. When you sacrifice Ordeal of Nylea, search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Primeval Protector
card.property: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature your opponents control. When Primeval Protector enters, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.

card.name: Rampant Growth
card.property: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Rishkar, Peema Renegade
card.property: When Rishkar, Peema Renegade enters, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures. Each creature you control with a counter on it has "{T}: Add {G}."

card.name: Rishkar's Expertise
card.property: Draw cards equal to the greatest power among creatures you control. You may cast a spell with mana value 5 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Sakura-Tribe Elder
card.property: Sacrifice Sakura-Tribe Elder: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Shamanic Revelation
card.property: Draw a card for each creature you control. Ferocious — You gain 4 life for each creature you control with power 4 or greater.

card.name: Snake Umbra
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card." Umbra armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

card.name: Soul's Majesty
card.property: Draw cards equal to the power of target creature you control.

card.name: Spearbreaker Behemoth
card.property: Indestructible {1}: Target creature with power 5 or greater gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Vastwood Surge
card.property: Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.) Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. If this spell was kicked, put two +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.

card.name: Whiptongue Hydra
card.property: Reach When Whiptongue Hydra enters, destroy all creatures with flying. Put a +1/+1 counter on Whiptongue Hydra for each creature destroyed this way.

card.name: Arcanist's Owl
card.property: Flying When Arcanist's Owl enters, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact or enchantment card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Dance of the Manse
card.property: Return up to X target artifact and/or non-Aura enchantment cards each with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. If X is 6 or more, those permanents are 4/4 creatures in addition to their other types.

card.name: Decimate
card.property: Destroy target artifact, target creature, target enchantment, and target land. (You can't cast this spell unless you have legal choices for all its targets.)

card.name: Grumgully, the Generous
card.property: Each other non-Human creature you control enters with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Hanna, Ship's Navigator
Mage Slayer
card.property: Whenever equipped creature attacks, it deals damage equal to its power to the player or planeswalker it's attacking. Equip {3}

card.name: Raff Capashen, Ship's Mage
card.property: Flash Flying You may cast historic spells as though they had flash. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

card.name: Rhythm of the Wild
card.property: Creature spells you control can't be countered. Nontoken creatures you control have riot. (They enter with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)

card.name: Ulasht, the Hate Seed
card.property: Ulasht, the Hate Seed enters with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other red creature you control and a +1/+1 counter on it for each other green creature you control. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Ulasht: Choose one — • Ulasht deals 1 damage to target creature. • Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

card.property: Flying Whenever Skysovereign, Consul Flagship enters or attacks, it deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls. Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Smuggler's Copter
card.property: Flying Whenever Smuggler's Copter attacks or blocks, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card. Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Solemn Simulacrum
card.property: When Solemn Simulacrum enters, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. When Solemn Simulacrum dies, you may draw a card.

card.property: Equipped creature has hexproof and haste. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Equip {1}

card.name: Sword of Vengeance
card.property: Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and has first strike, vigilance, trample, and haste. Equip {3}

card.name: Weatherlight
card.property: Flying Whenever Weatherlight deals combat damage to a player, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a historic card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.) Crew 3

card.property: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

card.name: Oran-Rief, the Vastwood
card.property: Oran-Rief, the Vastwood enters tapped. {T}: Add {G}. {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each green creature that entered this turn.

card.name: Port Town
card.property: As Port Town enters, you may reveal a Plains or Island card from your hand. If you don't, Port Town enters tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

card.name: Prairie Stream
card.property: ({T}: Add {W} or {U}.) Prairie Stream enters tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.
